metadata.title: Canis Vet | Veterinary Clinic Arad - Dr. Raul Tatar
metadata.description: Canis Vet Arad - Veterinary clinic with complete services for pets in Arad. Medical consultations, surgery, vaccination, emergencies and veterinary pharmacy at the highest standard.

hero.title: Trusted veterinary care in Arad
hero.description: At Canis Vet, we are dedicated to the health and well-being of your animals. We offer complete veterinary medicine services with state-of-the-art equipment and a team with over 10 years of experience.

services.label: What We Offer
services.title: Complete Veterinary Services
services.description: From routine check-ups to complex surgical procedures, our team provides exceptional care at every stage of your pet's life.

team.label: Dedicated Professionals
team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team has solid experience of over 10 years in the field of pet care, providing services of the highest quality.

gallery.label: Our Clinic
gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.description: Take a look inside our clinic and get to know the spaces where we care for your animals.

about.label: About the Clinic
about.title: Out of love for animals
about.p1: At CanisVet, our vision is to create a world where pets live the happiest and healthiest lives, and their owners have the peace of mind of receiving the best possible care.
about.p2: Whether it's preventive medical care, medical advice, grooming or sharing pet stories, CanisVet is here to be your partner in every situation.
about.item1: Team with solid experience of over 10 years

cta.title: Schedule your pet's visit today
cta.description: We accept new animals. Appointments available including on an emergency basis.

footer.description:
SC VETRIGOLA FARM SRL
Veterinary medicine with passion and dedication for each patient.

consultatii.title: Consultations & Veterinary Treatments
consultatii.subtitle: Complete clinical evaluations and personalized treatment plans
consultatii.description: Veterinary consultations and treatments are essential services we provide for you and your pets. Based on these diagnoses, we develop personalized treatment plans to ensure the recovery and improvement of your animals' health.

details.heading: General medical consultations
details.text: Complete clinical examination of the pet, assessment of general health status and recommendations for maintaining a healthy lifestyle.

details.heading: Advanced diagnostics
details.text: Investigations for cardiac, pulmonary, dermatological, ocular, gastrointestinal, urinary and locomotor conditions, supplemented with otoscopic and microscopic examinations.

details.heading: Ultrasounds and electrocardiograms
details.text: Abdominal, soft tissue, cardiac and vascular ultrasounds, electrocardiograms and blood pressure measurements for precise diagnosis.

details.heading: Rapid tests
details.text: Rapid tests for quick identification of pathogens and prompt diagnosis, reducing waiting time for owner and animal.

chirurgie.title: Veterinary Surgery
chirurgie.subtitle: Safe surgical procedures with modern equipment
chirurgie.description: Veterinary surgery is an essential service we offer to ensure the health and well-being of your animals, combining medical expertise with cutting-edge technology to provide safe and effective treatments.

details.heading: Spaying and neutering
details.text: Routine procedures performed under maximum safety conditions, with careful anesthesia monitoring and rapid postoperative recovery.

details.heading: Soft tissue surgery
details.text: Procedures for internal organ, skin and soft tissue conditions, including tumor removal and resolution of digestive obstructions.

details.heading: Urinary tract surgery
details.text: Specialized urinary tract procedures, including cystotomy and urethrotomy, to resolve urinary stones and obstructions.

details.heading: Ophthalmological and dental procedures
details.text: Surgical procedures for eye appendages and complete dental treatments, ensuring the health of animals' eyes and teeth.

laser.title: Laser Treatment
laser.subtitle: Non-invasive therapy for pain reduction and healing
laser.description: Laser treatment in veterinary medicine is a non-invasive technique that uses laser light to help reduce pain, promote healing and manage inflammation in pets.

details.heading: Chronic pain reduction
details.text: Laser therapy is effective in managing chronic pain caused by arthritis, hip dysplasia or other degenerative joint conditions.

details.heading: Accelerated healing
details.text: Laser light stimulates cells and accelerates natural healing processes, reducing recovery time after surgical procedures or injuries.

details.heading: Inflammation reduction
details.text: Laser therapy effectively reduces inflammation and tissue edema, providing rapid relief in acute or chronic inflammatory conditions.

details.heading: Painless and safe procedure
details.text: Laser therapy sessions are completely painless, require no anesthesia and can be performed in a short time, without any special preparation.

laborator.title: Veterinary Analysis Laboratory
laborator.subtitle: Rapid and precise diagnosis directly in the clinic
laborator.description: Our analysis laboratory is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment for rapid and precise diagnosis of your animals' health, with results available quickly to start treatment as soon as possible.

details.heading: Hematological analyses
details.text: Complete blood count to evaluate red blood cells, white blood cells and platelets, essential for diagnosing infections, anemias and other conditions.

details.heading: Blood biochemistry
details.text: Complete biochemical profile to evaluate hepatic, renal and pancreatic function, providing an overview of the internal organ status.

details.heading: Microbiological analyses
details.text: Identification of pathogens (bacteria, parasites, fungi) through microscopic examination and rapid tests, for precise etiological diagnosis.

details.heading: Rapid results
details.text: Analyses are performed directly in the clinic with our own equipment, results being available quickly for prompt medical intervention.

radiologie.title: Radiology & X-rays
radiologie.subtitle: Imaging investigations for precise diagnosis
radiologie.description: Veterinary X-rays are a valuable tool in identifying and diagnosing numerous conditions. We have high-performance equipment that allows us to quickly identify your pet's health problems and initiate appropriate treatment in the shortest possible time.

details.heading: Digital X-rays
details.text: State-of-the-art digital radiography system that produces high-resolution images for precise diagnosis of bones, joints, lungs and abdomen.

details.heading: Locomotor system diagnosis
details.text: Identification of fractures, dislocations, arthritis and other bone or joint conditions, with superior accuracy compared to conventional methods.

details.heading: Thoracic and abdominal conditions
details.text: Assessment of lungs, heart and abdominal organs, identifying pneumonia, heart disease, obstructions or tumor masses.

details.heading: Treatment monitoring
details.text: Follow-up X-rays to monitor treatment progress or post-surgical recovery, ensuring prompt medical intervention at any change.

internare.title: Hospitalization Space — 8 Places
internare.subtitle: Continuous monitoring for complete recovery
internare.description: We know how important it is to have your animal under supervision for certain conditions, so that the treatment applied has the desired effect. We have a hospitalization space with 8 places, ensuring the best recovery conditions.

details.heading: Hospitalization space with 8 places
details.text: Our clinic has 8 comfortable and hygienic hospitalization places, ensuring optimal recovery conditions for animals undergoing treatment.

details.heading: Permanent supervision
details.text: Our staff permanently monitors the condition of hospitalized animals, promptly intervening at any change in health status.

details.heading: Post-operative care
details.text: Animals that have undergone surgical procedures benefit from complete post-operative care, including treatment administration and recovery monitoring.

details.heading: Hospital regime treatment
details.text: For conditions requiring repeated treatments or intensive monitoring, we offer hospitalization in veterinary hospital regime, ensuring continuity of care.

farmacie.title: Veterinary Pharmaceutical Point
farmacie.subtitle: Quality pharmaceutical products for your animal's health
farmacie.description: Our clinic has a veterinary pharmaceutical point with a varied range of medicines, antiparasitic products and nutritional supplements, accompanied by professional advice for correct product selection and use.

details.heading: Veterinary medicines
details.text: We stock a complete range of veterinary medicines for the treatment of various conditions, dispensed on prescription or on the recommendation of the veterinarian.

details.heading: Antiparasitic products
details.text: We provide external antiparasitic products (anti-flea, anti-tick) and internal ones (anthelmintic) for dogs and cats, from renowned brands.

details.heading: Nutritional supplements
details.text: Vitamins, minerals, joint supplements, probiotics and other products for maintaining and improving your pet's health.

details.heading: Pharmaceutical advice
details.text: Our team provides specialized advice on choosing and correctly administering pharmaceutical products, ensuring the safety and effectiveness of treatment.

hrana.title: Animal Food
hrana.subtitle: Quality nutritional products for dogs and cats
hrana.description: We offer a varied range of food for pets, to ensure them a healthy and enjoyable life. Our products are adapted to the specific nutritional needs of your animal's breed, age and health status.

details.heading: Dry and wet food
details.text: Varied range of dry and wet food for dogs and cats, from internationally renowned brands, with nutritionally balanced formulas for optimal health.

details.heading: Age-adapted food
details.text: Special formulas for puppies/kittens, adults and senior animals, adapted to the specific nutritional needs of each life stage.

details.heading: Medical food
details.text: Veterinary diets for animals with renal, cardiac, digestive or dermatological conditions, or for weight management, recommended by the veterinarian.

details.heading: Premium products
details.text: Food made from high-quality natural ingredients, without artificial additives, for animals with special nutritional needs or for owners who choose the best.

cosmetica.title: Animal Grooming
cosmetica.subtitle: Professional care services for your pet
cosmetica.description: In a pleasant environment, with qualified staff passionate about animals, we offer complete grooming and cosmetic care solutions for your pet.

details.heading: Professional grooming
details.text: Trimming adapted to the breed and owner's preferences, performed by specialized staff experienced in caring for all breeds of dogs and cats.

details.heading: Washing and drying
details.text: Washing with special shampoos adapted to the coat type, followed by professional drying and brushing for a well-groomed appearance and healthy coat.

details.heading: Coat care
details.text: Regular brushing, dematting, special treatments for dry or problem coats, ensuring the health and shine of your animal's coat.

details.heading: Nail and ear care
details.text: Nail trimming and ear cleaning, essential procedures for the comfort and health of the animal, performed with care and gentleness.

accesorii.title: Accessories & Toys
accesorii.subtitle: Everything you need for a happy and active pet
accesorii.description: We offer a varied range of accessories and toys for pets, to ensure them an active, healthy and fun life, along with all the products needed for their daily comfort and safety.

details.heading: Collars, leashes and harnesses
details.text: Safe and comfortable walking accessories for dogs of all sizes, including chest harnesses, adjustable collars and retractable leashes of quality.

details.heading: Interactive toys
details.text: Toys that stimulate the animal's physical and mental activity, from balls and frisbees to interactive puzzles for dogs and cats.

details.heading: Transport products
details.text: Crates, transport bags and car covers, for safe and comfortable travel of your animal to the vet or on vacation.

details.heading: Comfort products
details.text: Blankets, beds, cushions and other accessories that provide a comfortable space and restful sleep for the pet.
